nodes.text: The Priole Danna system was a star system located within the Sprizen sector, a part of the Outer Rim Territories and New Territories galactic regions. The system was the origin point of the Priole Danna Festival, a celebration of music, parades and dramatic reenactments that was held annually on the Colonies planet Lamuir IV.
The Priole Danna system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square O-5.
